io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusNoteService


  • public interface NucleusNoteService
    A service that determines whether a subject has notes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getNotes

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Note> getNotes(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user)
        Gets all notes for a specific user
        Parameters:
        user - The User to check.
        Returns:
        A list of Notes.

      • addNote

        boolean addNote(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource source,
                java.lang.String note)
        Adds a note to a subject.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to add a note to.
        source - The CommandSource that is adding the note.
        note - The note to add.
        Returns:
        true if the note was added.

      • removeNote

        boolean removeNote(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                   Note note)
        Removes a note from a subject.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to remove a note from.
        note - The Note to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the note was removed.

      • clearNotes

        boolean clearNotes(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user)
        Clears all notes from a subject.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to remove all notes from.
        Returns:
        true if all notes were removed.
